mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is two receipts, atttached together, for taxes paid "To the Treasrurer of Rockbridge County, Dr." for 1896. The first bears the name of Thornton Banister with the value of land stated at $100 and the value of property stated at $15. Total paid was $1.09 The second receipt bears the names of Thornton Bannister and Givens Drummond. Value of the land is stated as $300 and the total paid was $2.80.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tax Receipts for Thornton Bannister and Givens Drummond, 1896
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Real property tax
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
